description: Daisuke meets Kanae at the airport, and winds up having sex with her in the ladies` room. Her friend Mika admonishes her, but the two of them join Daisuke, Maya, Momona, Nao, and Mitsugu for a barbecue. There aren`t enough ingredients to feed them all, so they go looking for edibles in the jungle. Daisuke runs into Kanae again and they have quick sex until they hear Mika scream. She has been captured by a carnivorous plant in the botanical gardens, but Daisuke manages to free her from it before anything happens to her. The next day, in gratitude, Mika has him sodomise her in a shower stall. Maya is irritated by all of the female attention that Daisuke has been getting, and petulantly feeds him poor meals. To make it up to her he goes up to watch a fireworks display with her, and they wind up making love.

titles.title: Minami no Shima no Harem Hen
